arabic_text: إِن تَحۡرِصۡ عَلَىٰ هُدَىٰهُمۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي مَن يُضِلُّۖ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ
translation: Even though you are keen to guide them, Allah does not guide those whom He causes to stray[24], and they will have no helpers.
footnotes: [24] As a result of their choice to reject guidance.
